subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Bruno Ruiz hit a ninth-inning home run to lift Mexicali, Mexico, past Maracay, Venezuela, 2-1, at the Little League World Series in South Williamsport, Pa.
snippet: Bruno Ruiz hit a ninth-inning home run to lift Mexicali, Mexico, past Maracay, Venezuela, 2-1, at the Little League World Series in South Williamsport, Pa.
